title: 290: Bachelor in Paradise: Ep 1 (Kenny is King?? Joe is Tripping?? Tahzjuan Stans!)

description:
It’s The Broads FIRST recap of Bachelor in Paradise and they have a lot to cover! They chat hosts, make outs, couples already blossoming, heart break already happening, upcoming theories/predictions and a lot more!
